name: Find IT!!
description:
Hi, this is a game i made in less than 12 hours for the MiniJam 121 : Reflection!
It's very short and i hope you like it!

The gameplay is simple, use your mouse to move the window wich you can see through to find the broken glass pieces! By ressing the "E" key on your keyboard you will be able to use your flashlight to see better but your window will become smaller for some time!
